feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP Development
feed.subtitle: ABAP Development Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Table maintenance alternatives in S/4HANA on premise
entry.content:
Hi,

We are working on defining best practice guidelines for creating maintenance objects in S/4HANA on promise. Depending on complexity, there seem to be a few options:

  • Using a simple Table Maintenance View from GUI with a Fiori Launchpad tile .
  • Using the Fiori app ‚ÄúCustom Business Objects‚Äù, which generates a BOPF object in the background.
  • Creating a ‚ÄòMaintenance Object‚Äô from Eclipse, which generates a RAP-based solution.

Since SAP provides the Custom Business Objects app, it could be a valid option, but RAP is the strategic direction.

I would appreciate recommendations or best practices on which approach to choose for both small/simple and more complex maintenance/configuration tables. No step-by-step instructions are needed; I am primarily looking for guidance on the preferred approach.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: ABAP Prog to create 2 sheets/tabs in ONE MS excel workbook & email
entry.content:
Hi,
Can anyone help me with a prog to create ONE MS excel workbook with 2 sheets/tabs and get emailed in background.
note: PLS DONT suggest me any GITHUB related as i see HTTP 411 / SSL errors..etc

I have copied the prog BCS_EXAMPLE_7 to a Z*prog & tried adding the code as below:

* add the spread sheet as attachment to document object
document->add_attachment(
i_attachment_type = 'xls'  
i_attachment_subject = 'Example2 ' " 
i_attachment_size = size
i_att_content_hex = binary_content ).

But its still sending 2 different excel sheets in One MS excel attachment.

Pls suggest.

Please help here!

entry.title: (Solved) Use Case: Bulk Clone SAP Domains and Data Elements from CSV
entry.content:
Use Case: Bulk Clone SAP Domains and Data Elements from CSV with Description Retention

This ABAP program automates the cloning of multiple SAP domains and data elements by reading old and new names from a CSV file. It not only creates new objects but also copies their short text descriptions seamlessly using the SAP text management function modules READ_TEXT and SAVE_TEXT. The program supports both domains and data elements, offers file selection with F4 help, and activates newly created objects automatically. This solution significantly speeds up mass cloning tasks in SAP development, ensuring consistency and saving manual effort.

üöÄ How to Use the Bulk Clone Tool for Domains & Data Elements

‚ú® **Prepare Your CSV File** ‚ú®
- No headers, just clean comma-separated values (.csv)
- Keep it simple: use **ONE file at a time** for either **Domains** or **Data Elements** (don‚Äôt mix!)
- Format example:
* OLD_DOMAIN_NAME_1,NEW_DOMAIN_NAME_1
* OLD_DATAELEMENT_1,NEW_DATAELEMENT_1

üöÄ **Run the Program** üöÄ
- Hit **F4** to open the file browser & pick your CSV
- Check the boxes for **Domains** and/or **Data Elements** to match your file
- Press **Execute** and watch the magic happen!
- Keep an eye on the screen logs for ‚úîÔ∏è success messages or ‚ö†Ô∏è warnings

abap program -

REPORT zclone_doma_dtel_from_csv1.

TYPE-POOLS: truxs.
************************************************************************
* SELECTION SCREEN
************************************************************************
PARAMETERS: p_path TYPE rlgrap-filename OBLIGATORY,
            p_doma AS CHECKBOX DEFAULT 'X',
            p_dtel AS CHECKBOX DEFAULT 'X'.

************************************************************************
* TYPES & VARIABLES
************************************************************************
TYPES: BEGIN OF ty_mapping,
         old_name TYPE ddobjname,
         new_name TYPE ddobjname,
       END OF ty_mapping.

DATA: lt_mapping TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ty_mapping,
      ls_mapping TYPE ty_mapping,
      lt_raw     TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF string,
      lv_line    TYPE string,
      lt_files   TYPE filetable,
      lv_rc      TYPE i,
      lv_file    TYPE string,
      lv_fname   TYPE string,
      lv_name    TYPE thead-tdname.

DATA: ls_doma        TYPE dd01v,
      ls_doma_text   TYPE dd01t,
      ls_dtel        TYPE dd04v,
      ls_dtel_text   TYPE dd04t,
      lt_texts       TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF itctc,
      ls_text        TYPE itctc.

************************************************************************
* F4 HELP FOR FILE PATH
************************************************************************
AT SELECTION-SCREEN ON VALUE-REQUEST FOR p_path.
  CALL METHOD cl_gui_frontend_services=>file_open_dialog
    EXPORTING
      window_title      = 'Select CSV File'
      default_extension = 'csv'
      file_filter       = 'CSV Files (*.csv)|*.csv|All Files (*.*)|*.*'
    CHANGING
      file_table        = lt_files
      rc                = lv_rc
    EXCEPTIONS
      OTHERS            = 1.
  IF sy-subrc = 0 AND lv_rc > 0.
    READ TABLE lt_files INTO lv_file INDEX 1.
    p_path = lv_file.
  ENDIF.

************************************************************************
* START OF SELECTION
************************************************************************
START-OF-SELECTION.

  lv_fname = p_path.

  " Upload CSV
  CALL METHOD cl_gui_frontend_services=>gui_upload
    EXPORTING
      filename = lv_fname
      filetype = 'ASC'
    CHANGING
      data_tab = lt_raw
    EXCEPTIONS
      OTHERS   = 1.
  IF sy-subrc <> 0.
    MESSAGE 'Error uploading file' TYPE 'E'.
  ENDIF.

  " Parse CSV
  LOOP AT lt_raw INTO lv_line.
    SPLIT lv_line AT ',' INTO ls_mapping-old_name ls_mapping-new_name.
    APPEND ls_mapping TO lt_mapping.
  ENDLOOP.

************************************************************************
* COPY DOMAINS
************************************************************************
  IF p_doma = abap_true.

    LOOP AT lt_mapping INTO ls_mapping.

      CLEAR: ls_doma, ls_doma_text, lt_texts, ls_text.

      " Get original domain definition
      CALL FUNCTION 'DDIF_DOMA_GET'
        EXPORTING
          name = ls_mapping-old_name
        IMPORTING
          dd01v_wa = ls_doma
        EXCEPTIONS
          OTHERS = 1.
      IF sy-subrc <> 0.
        WRITE: / '‚ùå Domain not found:', ls_mapping-old_name.
        CONTINUE.
      ENDIF.

      " Change name
      ls_doma-domname = ls_mapping-new_name.

      " Put new domain
      CALL FUNCTION 'DDIF_DOMA_PUT'
        EXPORTING
          name     = ls_mapping-new_name
          dd01v_wa = ls_doma
        EXCEPTIONS
          OTHERS = 1.
      IF sy-subrc <> 0.
        WRITE: / '‚ùå Error creating domain:', ls_mapping-new_name.
        CONTINUE.
      ENDIF.

      " Copy long texts
      CLEAR ls_text.
      ls_text-destobject = 'DD01T'.
      ls_text-destname   = ls_mapping-new_name.
      ls_text-destid     = 'DOMA'.
      ls_text-destlang   = sy-langu.
      ls_text-srcobject  = 'DD01T'.
      ls_text-srcname    = ls_mapping-old_name.
      ls_text-srcid      = 'DOMA'.
      ls_text-srclang    = sy-langu.
      APPEND ls_text TO lt_texts.

      CALL FUNCTION 'COPY_TEXTS'
        EXPORTING
          savemode_direct = 'X'
          insert          = 'X'
        TABLES
          texts           = lt_texts
        EXCEPTIONS
          OTHERS          = 1.

      " Copy short description (DD01T)
      SELECT SINGLE * FROM dd01t INTO ls_doma_text
       WHERE domname = ls_mapping-old_name AND ddlanguage = sy-langu.
      IF sy-subrc = 0.
        ls_doma_text-domname = ls_mapping-new_name.
        INSERT dd01t FROM ls_doma_text.
      ENDIF.

      " Activate domain
      CALL FUNCTION 'DDIF_DOMA_ACTIVATE'
        EXPORTING
          name = ls_mapping-new_name
        EXCEPTIONS
          OTHERS = 1.

      IF sy-subrc = 0.
        WRITE: / '‚úÖ Domain created:', ls_mapping-new_name.
      ELSE.
        WRITE: / '‚ö†Ô∏è Domain activation failed:', ls_mapping-new_name.
      ENDIF.

    ENDLOOP.

  ENDIF.

************************************************************************
* COPY DATA ELEMENTS
************************************************************************
  IF p_dtel = abap_true.

    LOOP AT lt_mapping INTO ls_mapping.

      CLEAR: ls_dtel, ls_dtel_text, lt_texts, ls_text.

      " Get original data element
      CALL FUNCTION 'DDIF_DTEL_GET'
        EXPORTING
          name = ls_mapping-old_name
        IMPORTING
          dd04v_wa = ls_dtel
        EXCEPTIONS
          OTHERS = 1.
      IF sy-subrc <> 0.
        WRITE: / '‚ùå Data element not found:', ls_mapping-old_name.
        CONTINUE.
      ENDIF.

      " Change name
      ls_dtel-rollname = ls_mapping-new_name.

      " Put new data element
      CALL FUNCTION 'DDIF_DTEL_PUT'
        EXPORTING
          name     = ls_mapping-new_name
          dd04v_wa = ls_dtel
        EXCEPTIONS
          OTHERS = 1.
      IF sy-subrc <> 0.
        WRITE: / '‚ùå Error creating data element:', ls_mapping-new_name.
        CONTINUE.
      ENDIF.

      " Copy long text
      CLEAR ls_text.
      ls_text-destobject = 'DD04T'.
      ls_text-destname   = ls_mapping-new_name.
      ls_text-destid     = 'DTEL'.
      ls_text-destlang   = sy-langu.
      ls_text-srcobject  = 'DD04T'.
      ls_text-srcname    = ls_mapping-old_name.
      ls_text-srcid      = 'DTEL'.
      ls_text-srclang    = sy-langu.
      APPEND ls_text TO lt_texts.

      CALL FUNCTION 'COPY_TEXTS'
        EXPORTING
          savemode_direct = 'X'
          insert          = 'X'
        TABLES
          texts           = lt_texts
        EXCEPTIONS
          OTHERS          = 1.

      " Copy short description (DD04T)
      SELECT SINGLE * FROM dd04t INTO ls_dtel_text
       WHERE rollname = ls_mapping-old_name AND ddlanguage = sy-langu.
      IF sy-subrc = 0.
        ls_dtel_text-rollname = ls_mapping-new_name.
        INSERT dd04t FROM ls_dtel_text.
      ENDIF.

      " Activate
      CALL FUNCTION 'DDIF_DTEL_ACTIVATE'
        EXPORTING
          name = ls_mapping-new_name
        EXCEPTIONS
          OTHERS = 1.

      IF sy-subrc = 0.
        WRITE: / '‚úÖ Data element created:', ls_mapping-new_name.
      ELSE.
        WRITE: / '‚ö†Ô∏è Data element activation failed:', ls_mapping-new_name.
      ENDIF.

    ENDLOOP.
  ENDIF.

üí° Tips for Creating Large Numbers

‚úÖ Test with 5‚Äì10 entries first to ensure structure and naming is correct.

‚è≥ For large uploads, consider running it as a background job (via SM36).

entry.title: Invoice Split Issue
entry.content:
Hello, 

I am facing an issue while invoice creation, actually it should not split an invoice, but it is splitting and the reason for the split are custom fields, but we did not right any custom logic to split. VBRK-ZUKRI is same for both the invoices but still 2 invoices created.

Regards,

Ravi Seela

entry.title: Pack Handling units for multiple Inbound Delivery items
entry.content:
Hi,

Is there a way to pack Handling units in multiple Inbound Delivery items using FM/BAPI? While creating the IBD, handling units have to be created and delivery items should be packed in the corresponding handling units. External HU numbers are used. 

I have tried GN_DELIVERY_CREATE and am able to do it for a single Delivery item. ie. One or more Handling units can be packed for a single delivery item during creation of the IBD using GN_DELIVERY_CREATE. 

But I have multiple Handling units to be packed for multiple delivery items (1 to 1). Is there a way to achieve this through ABAP code?

Thanks in Advance for your replies. 

Rincy

entry.title: Vendor Master Customization(Implementation).
entry.content:
Hi All,

I got a requirement from Business user, They want when End user fill data manually in BP to make Vendor Code, Normal when we save they provide me Vendor Code. But their requirement is User when save SAP not provide them Vendor Code , Only allow to save the DATA. After the finance approval only after approval or When Finance approve it by Approval Button only then they get the Vendor Code automatically on the End user Mail id.

My idea  is, We can make Custom T-CODE with the help of ABAP just like BP, And custom tables to store data.

I want to know the feasibility, Idea and solution for the requirement.

Please help me here.

entry.title: Complex Value Help for Multidimensional Query (CDS-Query)
entry.content:
Hi,

im trying to implement a value help for the business partner field with more than the description field (e.g. streetname, country etc.).

Similiar to the value help for CompanyCode (inherit from a standard cds view)

I tried to create a similiar value help for business partner

but it is not working (only description field, no country)

 

This is the CDS-Cube used for the query

I think building a complex value help for a fiori elements report could be realized with Consumption.valueHelpDefnition, but it is not working for cds-queries build with custom analytical queries fiori app.

best regards

entry.title: enable barcode for Serial ID on RF screen
entry.content:
Hello Everyone,

We have a requirement to enable Barcode for Serial ID field in Bin-to-Bin scenario. Upon scanning the barcode string, Serial ID need be decoded so that it gets added as new line item to the scanned List.

This way business will get to know how many serial Ids are scanned.

 FM - /SCWM/RF_XSERNR_PAI gets triggered when you enter Serial Id manually or when 2D barcode string is entered in Input field.

It is working when we enter Serial ID manually hit enter.  Serial ID gets add to the scanned list as below.

In the standard RF screen, Serial ID field is just declared of type Input/Output. We have created custom screen and enabled property Barcode = 'TRUE' and checked it as scrollable. default length made it as 255, output as 18.

As we declared output length as 18 and we are passing input as 2D barcode string, ABAP dump is raised with message ‚ÄòOutput field too short for converted value‚Äô because of the SERIAL ID conversion exit routine.

Dump says System is expecting plain Serial ID as an input. We validated BADI - /SCWM/EX_BARC_DECODE but it is not triggering in our case.

FYI - Conversion routine is triggered before PAI FM is triggered.

Expectation ‚Äì We are looking for BADI or Enhancement before Routine where we can write custom logic to decode the barcode string and pass Serial Id as input (like we are currently entering manually).

I just wanted to check if anyone has worked on similar kind of requirement.

RF menu Path - 050205, Logical transaction -AHPRTO, step - XSERNR

 

Thank you.

Regards,

Karthik

entry.title: My inbox PO enhancement with PO Changes as a composition
entry.content:
Hello, i'm trying to add a table of PO Changes made using CDS View into the Purchase Order Approval detail page in My Inbox.

I tried the mentioned blog below, but no success yet.

https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-q-a/my-inbox-po-enhancement-with-approvers-as-a-composition/qaa-p/12673395#M4754835

I made the following CDS View to show the purchase changes and added it to C_PurchaseOrderFs Extension.

After that, i made a enhancement into MPC_EXT as mentioned in the blog trying to add the association into the Metadata of the SEGW service C_PURCHASEORDER_FS.

 

But, the change is not reflecting yet in the My Inbox App, i only see a new area with the title but no table is displayed there.
i have already tried to extend the SEGW service, but it does not work with My inbox. I also tried a new service, but that didn't work also. As i understood from the blog, the guys were able to solve it using the standard service and adding some enhancement only, but the main problem here is that i'm not able to see the associations and also, i'm unable to add the associations. 
Do you guys have any idea on how i could solve it?

thanks.

entry.title: ALV display : 'ZERO' object reference is not possible during more entries
entry.content:
Hi,

I am displaying ALV output report using cl_salv_table=>factory.
While displaying columns headers, i am renaming them with more meaningful desc using:

  CALL METHOD lo_colstab->get_column as below:

  
TRY.
CALL METHOD lo_colstab->get_column
EXPORTING
columnname = 'ERRTYP'
RECEIVING
value = lv_colname. " TYPE REF TO CL_SALV_COLUMN
CATCH cx_salv_not_found .
ENDTRY.

lv_colname->set_short_text( 'Errtyp' ).


Now, when my ALV output is showing 10,000 entries it works fine where
lv_colname is holding {O:90*\CLASS=CL_SALV_COLUMN_TABLE}.

But when the ALV is trying to show more entries like >25000 it dumps saying like:
"Access using a 'ZERO' object reference is not possible." & is pointing to this line
 lv_colname->set_short_text( 'Errtyp' ).

At this time, lv_colname is NULL.

Why is this behavior seen when there are more entries to be displayed in ALV output?

 

Thanks

entry.title: MDG Highlight Changes
entry.content:
Hello Gals and Guys

In MDGIMG you can check or uncheck if to Highlight Changes (HC) or not:

So it means that for Application BS_OVP_BP / Configuration BS_OVP_CU changes should be highlighted.

this is what we have here:

I assume that there are all entities / uibbs and feeder clases under this application / config ... 

So there must be kind of "loop" where these ( configs/apps/uibbs ) are processed (and highlighted).

Where it happens? In handler class? If so ... which method?

I am asking because there is one section (relationships ) that is not highlighted and I am trying to find why.

Thank you.

entry.title: Which technologies are used to develop travel apps?
entry.content: I am starting this discussion for everyone who can answer my query.
